long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WP Tags tracker+ helps you track your site's tag usage, including the last used date and monthly usage. 

Very handy tool when dealing for sites with High volume of tags in your site, Also if you're managing multiple wordpress sites.

You can simply click on any listed tags and it will get automatically add to the tags box in your wordpress site.

To add tags in bulk. After login to your wordpress site, Load the tags from your site URL like this: https://example.com/wp-json/wp/v2/tags
 
Note: Make sure to REST access is enabled if not, Enable the /tags and /post endpoints.

If you have only limited number of tags to add manually, Click on the add tag item.
